com.google.android.exoplayer.drm

Class StreamingDrmSessionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.drm.StreamingDrmSessionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrmSessionManager

    public class StreamingDrmSessionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements DrmSessionManager
    A base class for DrmSessionManager implementations that support streaming playbacks using MediaDrm.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  StreamingDrmSessionManager.EventListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be notified of StreamingDrmSessionManager events.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StreamingDrmSessionManager

        public StreamingDrmSessionManager(java.util.UUID uuid,
                          Looper playbackLooper,
                          MediaDrmCallback callback,
                          Handler eventHandler,
                          StreamingDrmSessionManager.EventListener eventListener)
                           throws UnsupportedSchemeException
        Parameters:
        uuid - The UUID of the drm scheme.
        playbackLooper - The looper associated with the media playback thread. Should usually be obtained using ExoPlayer.getPlaybackLooper().
        callback - Performs key and provisioning requests.
        eventHandler - A handler to use when delivering events to eventListener. May be null if delivery of events is not required.
        eventListener - A listener of events. May be null if delivery of events is not required.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedSchemeException - If the specified DRM scheme is not supported.

    • Method Detail

      • getState

        public int getState()
        Description copied from interface: DrmSessionManager
        Gets the current state of the session.
        Specified by:
        getState in interface DrmSessionManager
        Returns:
        One of DrmSessionManager.STATE_ERROR, DrmSessionManager.STATE_CLOSED, DrmSessionManager.STATE_OPENING, DrmSessionManager.STATE_OPENED and DrmSessionManager.STATE_OPENED_WITH_KEYS.

      • getMediaCrypto

        public MediaCrypto getMediaCrypto()
        Description copied from interface: DrmSessionManager
        Gets a MediaCrypto for the open session.

        This method may be called when the manager is in the following states: DrmSessionManager.STATE_OPENED, DrmSessionManager.STATE_OPENED_WITH_KEYS

        Specified by:
        getMediaCrypto in interface DrmSessionManager
        Returns:
        A MediaCrypto for the open session.

      • requiresSecureDecoderComponent

        public boolean requiresSecureDecoderComponent(java.lang.String mimeType)
        Description copied from interface: DrmSessionManager
        Whether the session requires a secure decoder for the specified mime type.

        Normally this method should return MediaCrypto#requiresSecureDecoderComponent(String), however in some cases implementations may wish to modify the return value (i.e. to force a secure decoder even when one is not required).

        This method may be called when the manager is in the following states: DrmSessionManager.STATE_OPENED, DrmSessionManager.STATE_OPENED_WITH_KEYS

        Specified by:
        requiresSecureDecoderComponent in interface DrmSessionManager
        Returns:
        Whether the open session requires a secure decoder for the specified mime type.

      • getError

        public java.lang.Exception getError()
        Description copied from interface: DrmSessionManager
        Gets the cause of the error state.

        This method may be called when the manager is in any state.

        Specified by:
        getError in interface DrmSessionManager
        Returns:
        An exception if the state is DrmSessionManager.STATE_ERROR. Null otherwise.
